<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#af855b75902853f01361087338474e82d"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#af855b75902853f01361087338474e82d">VLIWSchedBoundary</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a2b9addafd0dbd0f989ed47c4cb88e704">VLIWSchedBoundary</a> &amp;other) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#aaa50af97a81760e0b9bca79b4812d3e5"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#aaa50af97a81760e0b9bca79b4812d3e5">init</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwmachinescheduler">VLIWMachineScheduler</a> &#42;dag, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetschedmodel">TargetSchedModel</a> &#42;smodel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a8ef275178044762d05bab6fa2a2e8857">DAG</a> = dag;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a151c9cb90050c235a96edc7bece4d6b7">SchedModel</a> = smodel;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a7f6e6e08cf13bdeb2c3c2fb098245584">CurrCycle</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a0154bd7be9607deec1be88b0c707c0f3">IssueCount</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize the critical path length limit, which used by the scheduling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cost model to determine the value for scheduling an instruction. We use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a slightly different heuristic for small and large functions. For small</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// functions, it&#39;s important to use the height/depth of the instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For large functions, prioritizing by height or depth increases spills.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BBSize = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a8ef275178044762d05bab6fa2a2e8857">DAG</a>-&gt;getBBSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a> = BBSize / <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a151c9cb90050c235a96edc7bece4d6b7">SchedModel</a>-&gt;getIssueWidth();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BBSize &lt; 50)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We divide by two as a cheap and simple heuristic to reduce the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// critcal path length, which increases the priority of using the graph</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// height/depth in the scheduler&#39;s cost computation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a> &gt;&gt;= 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For large basic blocks, we prefer a larger critical path length to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// decrease the priority of using the graph height/depth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxPath = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;SU : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a8ef275178044762d05bab6fa2a2e8857">DAG</a>-&gt;SUnits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">          MaxPath = std::max(MaxPath, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a4a6efc0e0ddae589abd29500051b42c9">isTop</a>() ? SU.getHeight() : SU.getDepth());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a>, MaxPath) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a4a6efc0e0ddae589abd29500051b42c9"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a4a6efc0e0ddae589abd29500051b42c9">isTop</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a82762ba9a6d9a67d70e532100f9512cb">Available</a>.getID() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa40f7f0675083aaa0ae6f43946859c03b">ConvergingVLIWScheduler::TopQID</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
